meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>describe</kanji> a bunch of <kanji>occurrence</kanji>s in a <kanji>poem</kanji>, it's probably an <vocabulary>epic poem</vocabulary>. This is for those super long, really descriptive poems you might be forced to read in school, like The Epic of Gilgamesh (ギルガメシュ叙事詩).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
